aboutme: I am a seasoned frontend developer with four years of experience in the field, three of which I have worked remotely with teams from the United States, allowing me to work with teams from all over the world. My years in software development have allowed me to meet all kinds of people, cultures, and teams.

In recent years, I have deepened my knowledge in the following technologies: React.js, TypeScript, Next.js, Vercel, Git, Sass, CSS, and HTML. This has enabled me to convert Figma designs into pixel-perfect websites.
Although I enjoy working with React.js, I am moving towards using JavaScript web components. In my most recent project, the web game.
